div.p: Model estimates of ( a) total migration speed per day, ( b) minimum stopover duration and ( c) airspeed of four species of Arctic-breeding shorebirds during pre- and post-breeding migration. Estimates are derived from linear mixed models (see text) and the box-and-whisker plots give median (horizontal line within box), interquartile range (box), range (bars) and the transparent dots show estimates for individual birds.
